cluster_information.name: Boolean State
cluster_information.description: This cluster provides an interface to a boolean state.

attributes.name: StateValue
attributes.description: This represents a boolean state. The semantics of this boolean state are defined by the device type using this cluster. For example, in a Contact Sensor device type, FALSE=open or no contact, TRUE=closed or contact.

events.name: StateChange
events.description: If this event is supported, it SHALL be generated when the StateValue attribute changes.

fields.name: StateValue
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the new value of the StateValue attribute.
